ValidationRule.description: Locks users from updating BRP Historical Data
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
$User.Username <> "shira@foundershield.com" && BRP_VR_Override__c = false && BRP_Historical_Data__c = TRUE &&
OR ( ISCHANGED( Policy_Type_Status__c ), ISCHANGED( StageName ), ISCHANGED( Premium__c ), ISCHANGED( OwnerId ), ISCHANGED(Id) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This record represents BRP Historical Data, and should not be updated. Please contact Maddie if you need updates.
